item.title: Git
item.description: First Second ugo$ hugo server -D | EN -------------------+----- Pages | 8 Paginator pages | 0 Non-page files | 0 Static files | 6 Processed images | 0 Aliases | 0 Sitemaps | 1 Cleaned | 0 Built in 64 ms Watching for changes in /mnt/d/learn/Hugo/{archetypes,content,data,layouts,static,themes} Watching for config changes in /mnt/d/learn/Hugo/config.toml Environment: "development" Serving pages from memory Running in Fast Render Mode. For full rebuilds on change: hugo server --disableFastRender Web Server is available at http://localhost:1313/ (bind address 127.
